Package de.oth.blocklib.shaders

Class AdditiveLightShader

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.shaders.ShaderProgram
de.oth.blocklib.shaders.BaseShader
de.oth.blocklib.shaders.AdditiveLightShader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Shader, java.lang.Comparable<Shader>
public class AdditiveLightShader
extends BaseShader
Shader to apply additional light sources besides the DayNightLighting to an object
Author:
Tobias Werner SoSe18
See Also:
Light, AdditiveLightMaterial
